member.name: T:HexaGen.Runtime.Bitfield
member.summary:
A utility for accessing bit fields.
Fast enoughâ„¢
.NET 9.0.7 (9.0.725.31616), X64 RyuJIT AVX-512F+CD+BW+DQ+VL+VBMI HardwareIntrinsics=AVX-512F+CD+BW+DQ+VL+VBMI,AES,BMI1,BMI2,FMA,LZCNT,PCLMUL,POPCNT VectorSize=256
| Method | Mean | Error | StdDev | |------- |---------:|----------:|----------:| | GetA | 1.077 ns | 0.0078 ns | 0.0065 ns | | SetA | 1.930 ns | 0.0127 ns | 0.0106 ns |

member.name: T:HexaGen.Runtime.NativeCallback`1
member.summary: Represents a native callback that can be passed to interop functions requiring a callback to C# code. Ensures that the callback remains valid beyond the current scope by holding a GCHandle.
member.typeparam: The delegate type of the callback.

member.name: F:HexaGen.Runtime.NativeCallback`1.Callback
member.summary: The managed delegate representing the callback.

member.name: F:HexaGen.Runtime.NativeCallback`1.Handle
member.summary: The GCHandle that ensures the callback remains allocated in memory.

member.name: M:HexaGen.Runtime.NativeCallback`1.#ctor(`0)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct.
member.param: The delegate to be used as the callback.

member.name: P:HexaGen.Runtime.NativeCallback`1.IsNull
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the callback is null.

member.name: P:HexaGen.Runtime.NativeCallback`1.IsAllocated
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the GCHandle is allocated.

member.name: P:HexaGen.Runtime.NativeCallback`1.IsDisposed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the instance has been disposed.

member.name: M:HexaGen.Runtime.NativeCallback`1.Dispose
member.summary: Releases the GCHandle and clears the callback.

member.name: M:HexaGen.Runtime.NativeCallback`1.op_Equality(HexaGen.Runtime.NativeCallback{`0},HexaGen.Runtime.NativeCallback{`0})
member.summary: Determines whether two instances are equal.

member.name: M:HexaGen.Runtime.NativeCallback`1.op_Inequality(HexaGen.Runtime.NativeCallback{`0},HexaGen.Runtime.NativeCallback{`0})
member.summary: Determines whether two instances are not equal.

member.name: M:HexaGen.Runtime.NativeCallback`1.op_Implicit(HexaGen.Runtime.NativeCallback{`0})~`0
member.summary: Implicitly converts a instance to its underlying delegate type.

member.name: F:HexaGen.Runtime.Utils.MaxStackallocSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum allowed size for stackalloc during marshalling (default: 2 KiB).

remarks.para: Warning: Setting this value too high may cause a .
Adjust with caution based on available stack space and application needs.
